course_title: Spec. Topics In Political Science: African Politics
class_notes: Students should have taken one of these courses - POLS 100, POLS 101, POLS 110, POLS 111, or POLS 120. Otherwise, students should contact the Instructor for permission.
course_description: May be repeated for credit when topic varies. Seminar and/or advanced class in selected political science topics. Primarily for students interested in politics.
prerequisites: POLS_OX 101 or POLS_OX 101Q or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3176, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Shomade, Status: Open
